title: V. Stiviano 'Thunderously Unintelligent' In Sterling Scandal?
teaser: The NBA has banned L.A. Clippers owner Donald Sterling from the league for life after tapes revealed racist comments he made to girlfriend V. Stiviano. The Beautyshop ladies weigh in.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
